channel.title: Attackble Npc Into Shop? (PI)
channel.description:
Hey Guys, So I Added An Npc In My World That Was Attackable So I Went Into Player Assist And Added Him With Firstclick Shops, Then Made A Shop For Him When I Compiled Then Logged In I Left Clicked On Him Nothing Happend, The Right Click Then "Attack" On Him, Still Nothing Happened How Do I Make It So That The Shop Pops Up When I Left Click Him?
Thanks :)
-CaZz

item.title: Attackble Npc Into Shop? (PI)
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Can you not just do this with a regular npc, instead of one that has the attack option?

Read full topic

item.title: Attackble Npc Into Shop? (PI)

item.description:
